Question: The first of the ____ Institutes was also built on the basis of this achievement.
Hints: In 1854, this person was named Dean of the new Faculty of Sciences in Lille.
In 1995, the centennial of the death of this person, the New York Times ran an article titled "this person's Deception".
The Lycée this person in Neuilly-sur-Seine, France and a large university hospital in Košice, Slovakia are also named after him.
